data.title: Guest house Alifakovac SARAJEVO in Sarajevo
data.meta_description: Find all information about Guest house Alifakovac SARAJEVO here and book easily at no extra costs.
data.text:
Offering city views and a garden, Guest house Alifakovac SARAJEVO provides accommodation well situated in Sarajevo, within a short distance of Bascarsija Street, Latin bridge and Sarajevo Cable Car. The property features pool and river views, and is 800 metres from Sebilj Fountain. The guest house offers rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi. Each unit comes with a balcony offering garden views, a cable flat-screen TV, a seating area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with slippers. Some units feature a terrace and/or a patio with mountain views and an outdoor dining area. At the guest house, each unit comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the guest house include Sarajevo City Hall, Gazi Husrev-beg Mosque in Sarajevo and Eternal Flame in Sarajevo. The nearest airport is Sarajevo International Airport, 10 km from Guest house Alifakovac SARAJEVO.

Please inform Guest house Alifakovac SARAJEVO in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. In the event of an early departure, the property will charge you the full amount for your stay. Parking is subject to availability due to limited spaces. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
